name: SPACEBOARD
description:
After a well-deserved vacation on planet Clavitron, our hero, MAX COOL decides to get back to space business... in STYLE! They purchase an advanced Clavian spacecraft, the CLAVINATOR 2014 and head off for SPACE ADVENTURE!

Unfortunately for Max, they never learned to read Clavian, and all the controls are illegible, even to a well-seasoned space cowboy like themself! Only YOU can help Max navigate safely, or they will surely meet their space demise...

CONTROLS

Left Shift, Right Shift, Tab, Enter: Color Modifiers

0-9, A-Z, ;, ,, ., /: Shoot symbol

Delete: Show "active keys" (active keys are the different-looking ones!)

HINT

Colourless symbols don't invoke a time penalty

Made for PegJam2014 - Jam theme: "Failure is not an option"

Game icon by @IMPLODINGORACLE

Cover art by @itsDaninsky

Everything else @KaiClavier

v1.1 Changelog:

  • New sounds
  • "Help" is more visible
  • Level difficulty adjustments
  • Lots of other small improvements

Upcoming features:

  • Background music
  • More levels/challenges
  • Leaderboards, maybe
